feed.title: Dittofeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.22.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • upgrade image versions to v0.21.0 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1333
  • Upgrade guide fix for 0.20 to 0.21 by @pkpio in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1334
  • v0.20.0 docs fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1337
  • allow anonymous users to receive computed properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1343
  • add keyed prop vid by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1344
  • update sdk-web revision by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1345
  • mailing list docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1346
  • add new mjml template to docs by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1347
  • remove escape html from email header by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1348
  • deliveries table auto reload by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1349
  • add broadcasts vid by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1350
  • users table filters v2 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1351
  • users table v2 contents by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1352
  • allow users to be filtered by subscription group from api by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1354
  • subscription group users table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1355
  • document admin deliveries endpoint by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1356
  • add arm support by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1357
  • users table pagination fixes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1358
  • delete debug log by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1359
  • use lightweight deletes for users delete by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1360
  • allow hidden messages by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1361
  • don't swallow retryable errors in postmark by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1365
  • fix journey definition from state for 0 time values by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1368
  • abstract build for ee by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1369
  • settings segment fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1370

New Contributors

  • @pkpio made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1334

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.21.0...v0.22.0
